data.title: Press Release Archives
data.text:
IT Solutions & Services (ITSS), a leading provider of cutting-edge IT solutions, is pleased to announce the successful completion of a significant upgrade and database conversion project for the Swiss- based global private bank EFG International.

The complex transformation programme, completed in 2023, involved the upgrade of EFG’s core banking system to Temenos T24 in all booking centres across the globe. This upgrade is an important step that will support the execution of EFG’s strategy of sustaining profitable growth and achieving scale, as well as delivering an enhanced client experience. It will also ensure that its technology infrastructure remains at the forefront of industry standards and continues to be competitive in the rapidly evolving digital landscape.

ITSS’ expertise and innovative solutions facilitated a smoothly transition to EFG’s new system, thus opening up numerous opportunities for optimisation and growth. ITSS is proud to have partnered with EFG on this important project and is committed to continuing to deliver best-in-class IT solutions that drive business transformation and success.

Official Quotes:

Dinis Goncalves, Project Manager at EFG: “We are very pleased that the transition of our core banking system has been completed seamlessly and successfully. This upgrade will not only enhance our current operations but also position us for future growth and innovation. With its dedication and expertise, ITSS was instrumental in bringing this project to fruition.”

Sufyan Belayachi, ITSS Project Manager: “We are immensely proud to have partnered with EFG International in this transformative endeavour. The successful migration underscores our commitment to delivering innovative solutions that drive tangible business outcomes for our clients.”

About EFG International:

EFG International is a global private banking group offering private banking and asset management services and is headquartered in Zurich. EFG International’s group of private banking businesses operates in around 40 locations worldwide. Its registered shares (EFGN) are listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange.

For more information : www.efginternational.com

About ITSS Global

With over two decades of consulting and business expertise, ITSS Global has been a stalwart in providing integrated global banking software services to financial institutions across Europe, Africa, the Middle East, Asia, and Latin America. Headquartered in Geneva and boasting 23+ global strategic offices, ITSS has played a pivotal role in helping legacy banks solidify and sustain their leadership positions by evolving core banking systems to meet ever-changing customer expectations.

For more information: www.itssglobal.com

Information Technology Solutions and Services – ITSS, a renowned global banking software integrator and solutions provider with twenty-three worldwide offices and over two decades of experience, announced the successful completion of a Temenos Transact upgrade project at Citadele banka (Citadele), Latvia.

Citadele aims to become a modern banking platform for the Baltics. An increasingly digital bank with a wide product suite and unique offerings for its private and business clients, complemented by innovative stand-alone solutions with unique value proposition. To support its strategy the Bank has been relying on technology and Temenos Transact, the most successful and widely used digital core-banking solution in the world.

The core banking system was upgraded from release Temenos Transact R19 to R22. The project started in March 2023 and went live in January 2024, allowing for a break for the holidays. The project was completed by ITSS consultants working from offshore with the Bank’s project team in Latvia.

The activities included converting the existing data to Transact R22, retrofitting local developments for Transact R22 compatibility, converting interfaces, installing R22 packs, checking COB compatibility, and conducting training. The ITSS project team supported the Bank’s team for SIT (Standard unit testing), and UAT (user acceptance testing). After the Bank went live, ITSS consultants stood by for post go-live support.

Guntars Andersons, Head of IT at Citadele, commented,

“We are excited to announce the successful completion of our core banking system upgrade. This milestone represents our commitment to enhancing operational efficiency, improving customer experience, and ensuring robust security. The upgraded system will enable us to better serve our clients, positioning us for continued growth and innovation in the dynamic financial landscape.”

He further added “I would highly recommend ITSS to anyone looking for a reliable and professional partner for their Temenos Transact upgrade project.”

Selvakumar Ammayappa, Banking Services Director Europe at ITSS remarked,

“I congratulate ITSS team and Citadele project team for successful completion of Temenos Transact upgrade project. Our project team and Citadele team worked seamlessly and in tandem to embark on a new Transact core banking release. We are happy that Citadele is on track with the modernization of its core system.”

About Citadele banka

Citadele’s mission is to modernize the financial sector by offering, in addition to classic banking services, a range of services based on the latest generation of financial technologies for both private individuals and entrepreneurs throughout the Baltics.

Visit their website to find out more: http://www.citadele.lv

About ITSS (Information Technology Solutions & Services)

ITSS Global is a technology company headquartered in Geneva, Switzerland. ITSS primarily provides banking technology, products, applications, support, and maintenance services, in addition to implementing Temenos Digital Banking services. ITSS has a worldwide presence with 23+ strategic international offices and over 850 expert consultants. Visit their website to find out more: https://www.itssglobal.com

[Malta, ITSS] – ITSS, a prominent leader in banking technology solutions, proudly announces a landmark agreement with BNF Bank p.l.c., cementing a strategic alliance designed to drive technological innovation and expansive growth. This partnership highlights ITSS’s role as a critical player in reshaping financial services through its advanced expertise in Temenos banking software.

Under this agreement, ITSS will leverage its expertise to implement Temenos Transact (T24) to meet the evolving needs of BNF Bank. This collaboration marks a key milestone for both organizations, as they align to deliver exceptional value and service excellence to their customers. The decision to collaborate with ITSS underscores BNF Bank’s confidence in ITSS’ expertise and proven track-record in delivering successful banking projects.

The decision to award the contract to ITSS followed planning sessions held over the past two years, during which the bank gained confidence in ITSS’ capabilities. With a proven track record and successful references in Malta, ITSS emerged as the ideal partner to fulfil the Bank’s project requirements.

The scope of the project encompasses a comprehensive range of implementations on Temenos Transact (T24), including the deployment of treasury and securities modules, integration with Bloomberg, configuration of GL chart of accounts, and implementation of deposits, loans, cheques, guarantees, along with corresponding interfaces. Additionally, the project will include the configuration of Temenos Datahub.

Data migration from the legacy system is also planned as part of the project, to ensure a seamless transition to the new platform.

Official Quotes:

In response to this alliance, Thiagaraj Jayachandran, the Executive Director at ITSS said, “This collaboration with BNF Bank is a powerful opportunity for us to drive meaningful impact, leveraging our services to support BNF Bank’s growth and success. With a shared dedication to excellence and forward-thinking strategies, both organizations are poised to achieve remarkable outcomes together.”

David Power, CEO, BNF Bank, remarked, “We are delighted to be implementing Temenos T24 Transact in collaboration with ITSS. This modernization initiative underscores our commitment to delivering best-in-class banking solutions to our

customers and reinforces our position as a leader in the Maltese financial services industry.”

He further added, “ITSS is playing a pivotal role in this journey, bringing deep domain expertise and technical proficiency to ensure the successful deployment of Temenos T24 Transact. As we embark on this new chapter, BNF remains committed to delivering exceptional banking experiences and driving positive change within our organization and the communities we serve.”

About ITSS (Information Technology Solutions & Services)

Leveraging over two decades of unparalleled consulting expertise and business acumen, ITSS Global stands at the forefront of providing comprehensive banking software solutions to financial institutions globally. Headquartered in Geneva and boasting a network spanning over twenty-three strategic locations worldwide, ITSS has played a pivotal role in empowering traditional banks to strengthen their market position by modernizing core banking systems to meet evolving customer expectations. With the recent unveiling of a new logo and mark, ITSS heralds a new era of momentum, reaffirming its status as a crucial global partner of Temenos.

About BNF Bank P.l.c, Malta

BNF Bank, a leading player in Malta’s financial services sector, operates under a banking license and prioritizes ethical and social responsibility. With twelve retail branches and an international presence in London, BNF Bank offers personalized products and services to individuals and businesses. Its Corporate and Business Banking centre, Treasury function, and resolute Customer Care team support its strategic goal of fortifying its position and values while adapting to future trends. Recognized as Bank of the Year Malta by The Banker for three years in a row.

Information Technology Solutions and Services (ITSS) Global, a titan in banking software solutions with a commanding presence in over twenty-three locations worldwide and over two decades of unparalleled expertise, has achieved a groundbreaking milestone with the Arab Investment Bank (aiBank). This collaboration has culminated in the seamless implementation of Automatic Clearing House (ACH) Automation & Integration, a move set to revolutionize the bank’s transactional efficiency and financial operations. This press release invites you to explore the synergy between ITSS’s innovative solutions and the bank’s forward-looking approach, marking a new era in banking efficiency.

A Strategic Alliance Defined by Vision & Expertise

The aiBANK & ITSS Partnership

In the dynamic world of banking technology, the Arab Investment Bank (aiBANK) faced a pivotal moment, ready to embark on a transformative project poised to reshape its operational framework. The choice of ITSS Global as a partner was not merely strategic but a testament to a shared vision and unparalleled expertise. This story of selection is a narrative of foresight, innovation, and a deep-seated understanding of the banking sector’s intricacies.

The Foundation of Trust

The alliance’s seeds were sown with the groundbreaking TPH implementation two years prior, marking a journey of mutual success and showcasing ITSS’s unmatched capabilities. This initial collaboration became the bedrock of trust and demonstrated a partnership capable of achieving remarkable feats.

Choosing Excellence

ITSS’s selection was driven by its profound grasp of local banking sector’s unique challenges, its technical innovation, and a track record of success that promised not just to meet but to exceed aiBANK’s ambitious goals. Their approach went beyond technical solutions, understanding aiBANK’s vision and aligning with its long-term objectives.

A Partnership Beyond Transactions

What distinguished ITSS was its commitment to a strategic partnership, prioritizing aiBANK’s aspirations and challenges, and customizing solutions to pave the way for future success. This collaboration was more than a project; it was a shared journey towards innovation and excellence.

As aiBANK embarked on this transformative venture with ITSS, it was clear this partnership was chosen not just for what ITSS could do but for how they thought alongside aiBANK. Together, they are not only aiming to achieve operational efficiency but also to redefine the benchmarks of banking technology. This press release invites readers to delve deeper into

the narrative of this strategic alliance, showcasing a partnership that exemplifies vision, expertise, and a commitment to redefine the future of banking.

Expanding Horizons: ITSS’s Pioneering Solution for aiBANK

In an ambitious stride towards enhancing its payment processing capabilities, aiBANK embarked on a significant project alongside ITSS, focusing on the implementation and integration of the Automatic Clearing House (ACH). This venture aimed to achieve Straight Through Processing for local payments across multiple currencies: Egyptian Pound (EGP), US Dollar (USD), and Euro (EUR). Central to this initiative was the deployment of the Temenos Payment Hub, a cutting-edge solution designed for seamless transaction processing.

The project’s complexity was further amplified by the need for meticulous integration and certification with the Egyptian Banks Company (EBC), underscoring the rigorous standards and collaborative efforts that defined this groundbreaking project. Through this initiative, aiBANK and ITSS have set a new benchmark in banking efficiency and transactional agility, underpinning their commitment to innovation and excellence in the financial sector.

Success Stories: Celebrating Partnership Achievements with ITSS and aiBANK.

“Our partnership with ITSS has truly been exceptional, and I am grateful for the collaborative spirit and innovative solutions they brought to the table. Together, we have achieved remarkable results that have not only met but exceeded our expectations starting from a smooth upgrade in 2022 followed by a first of a kind successful products rollout (TPH, SDB, TFO and ACH). As we look forward to continuing our partnership in the long term, I am confident that together, we will continue to drive innovation, overcome challenges, and deliver value to aiBANK. Their professionalism, responsiveness, and proactive approach make them an invaluable partner, and I am excited about the possibilities that lie ahead.”

– Mohamed Hussein, Head of Core Banking & Project Sponsor, aiBank

“I’m immensely proud to announce the successful implementation of the first TPH module implementation in Egypt, marking a significant milestone in our journey towards operational excellence. This achievement underscores the dedication and collaborative spirit of our team, as well as the invaluable partnership we have forged with aiBank. Together, we have not only met but exceeded expectations, demonstrating the power of synergy and shared vision. This success reaffirms our commitment to delivering unparalleled service and innovative solutions, setting the stage for continued growth and prosperity in our partnership with aiBank.”

– Amine Ajouad, Regional Director (MEA), ITSS

About Information Technology Solutions & Services (ITSS)

For over twenty years, ITSS Global has been a pioneering force in revolutionizing the global banking industry. Renowned for our blend of consulting expertise and innovative software solutions, ITSS Global has established itself as a leading provider of integrated banking services worldwide. From the bustling streets of Europe to the vibrant markets of Africa, the dynamic landscapes of the Middle East and Asia, and the thriving economies of Latin America, our presence spans continents.

Headquartered in the vibrant city of Geneva, ITSS operates a global network comprising over twenty-three strategically positioned offices. Our mission is clear: to empower legacy banks not only to survive but to thrive in an ever-evolving digital era. Through our commitment to innovation, we have enabled countless financial institutions to strengthen their leadership positions by seamlessly adapting their core banking systems to exceed the ever-heightening expectations of their customers. At ITSS, we are dedicated to driving the future of banking, one innovative solution at a time.

For more info, please visit www.itssglobal.com

About Arab Investment Bank (aiBank)

Established in 1974 under the supervision of the Central Bank of Egypt, Arab Investment Bank (aiBANK) has evolved into a leading investment and business bank. With a capital base of EGP 5,000,000,003 and a strategic ownership structure, including EFG Holding S.A.E, Algeria’s Financial Services and Digital Transformation Sub-Fund, and National Investment Bank, aiBANK is committed to delivering comprehensive corporate, retail banking, investment, and treasury services. Our Sharia-compliant offerings and focus on supporting small and medium enterprises underscore our dedication to fostering Algeria as well as whole of MEA regional economic and social development. With thirty-four branches nationwide and a commitment to expanding our presence, aiBANK prioritizes customer satisfaction through innovative services and continuous investment in technology and human capital.

For more info, please visit www.aibegypt.com/en

In a significant milestone, ITSS Global has concluded the extensive Core Replacement Project for the National Bank of Iraq (NBI), based in the capital city of Baghdad. This transformative project saw the complete overhaul of the bank’s legacy core, replacing it with the pinnacle in core banking technology, Temenos Transact.

The scale of this endeavor is underscored by the integration of the new system with 27 channels and endpoints, accompanied by the migration of data for over 222,000 customers. Notably, the implementation of Temenos Payments Hub (TPH) further solidified the bank’s position as a forward-thinking institution Taking into account that NBI manages a substantial 385,000 accounts.

Building on a longstanding history of successful collaborations, ITSS once again proved to be a trusted partner throughout this transformative journey. The ITSS team seamlessly integrated with the NBI project team, providing access to talented experts and playing a vital role in building a formation for a successful team. Recognized as an accomplished integrator, ITSS demonstrated an in-depth understanding of the bank’s ecosystem and operating model, essential for completing projects within stringent time, budget, and scope constraints.

ITSS showcased flexibility in responding to emerging changes, prioritizing project success over competing priorities. The early adoption of foundational yet niche products like “Temenos Payments Hub” required extensive engineering and customization work, showcasing the strength of teamwork, dedication, and innovative solutions.

“In such a competitive digital world, it is critical for NBI to build a modernized IT eco-system to avail customer-centric channels with a highly personalized digital experience,” stated Adel Awad, Group Chief Information and Security Officer “Our choice to partner with Temenos and ITSS has resulted in a best-in-class Core Banking System that offers a native modernized payment infrastructure alongside flawless conventional banking capabilities.”

Awad further emphasized, “The project involved migrating over 27 channels and integration points, adapting to local and regulatory requirements, a major undertaking that we achieved in record time in the world of core banking system migration projects. That was only possible with the instrumental role of our technical and project team, and the help of our trusted partners.”

Diana Mughrabi, Senior Project Manager at ITSS, expressed her enthusiasm, stating, “I am delighted to share some wonderful news! Our third significant project of the year, executed in collaboration with our esteemed clients at the National Bank of Iraq, has successfully gone live. We extend our heartfelt gratitude to the exceptional teams involved, whose collaborative efforts made possible the seamless ‘big bang’ deployment of Temenos Transact, the industry-leading core banking solution.”

About ITSS Global: With over two decades of consulting and business expertise, ITSS Global has been a stalwart in providing integrated global banking software services to financial institutions across Europe, Africa, the Middle East, Asia, and Latin America. Headquartered in Geneva and boasting 23+ global strategic offices, ITSS has played a pivotal role in helping legacy banks solidify and sustain their leadership positions by evolving core banking systems to meet ever-changing customer expectations.

ITSS, a leading banking software and service provider, is pleased to announce the successful implementation of its proprietary solutions Sigma Suite and JBLoader at the CQUR Bank LLC. Sigma Suite is an enterprise-grade monitoring, analytics, and reporting solution from ITSS, while JBLoader is their prized data extraction tool.

The Sigma Suite implementation and JBLoader installation were completed using a hybrid model (onsite & remote) using the Agile framework and a fixed costs model. With the successful completion of this project, the bank is now able to realize its goals of generating timely and standardized reports for the regulatory authorities (QFCA: Qatar Financial Centre Regulatory Authority) as well as for the bank management, internal purposes and for auditors.

The ITSS project team meticulously completed the project within the agreed timeline, saving the client’s precious time and resources. ITSS experts furnished the required training, testing, and post Go-Live support to the bank’s teams.

Here is what Kenny Justin, COO at the CQUR Bank LLC, had to say about ITSS upon completion of the project:

“Grateful to ITSS for a swift and well-managed project completion. The Sigma Suite reporting solution solved the historical issues that had piled up due to ‘manual approach’ used earlier at our bank. Our team also thanks ITSS experts for detailed training and support and for making us feel comfortable with Sigma rules engine. Additionally, JBLoader installation has made handling and extracting data much easier for us and swiftly bridges T24 to Sigma Suite.”

JC, Product Manager, ITSS, commented, “It is great to see Sigma Suite at work. It is the most elegant solution for reporting automation and is superior to its competitors. Combination of Sigma Suite and JBLoader can help any bank aim for higher goals and better business.”

Babar Mahmood, Project Manager at ITSS Global, commented,“The Sigma Suite Implementation project proved another achievement of successful delivery of milestones. Agile methodology impressively contributed to the delivery within specified timelines. I admire the support & collaboration from CQUR Bank & ITSS team members that helped us achieve the common goal resulting in high-quality Project Management.”

About CQUR Bank

Headquartered in Doha, CQUR Bank offers a range of banking products and services to corporate international customers as well as High Net Worth Individuals helping them achieve short- and long-term financial goals. The strategic goal of the Bank is to provide high quality services to its customers worldwide.

About ITSS Global

ITSS has encompassed over two decades of consulting and business expertise, serving integrated global banking software services to banks and financial institutions across Europe, Africa, the Middle East, Asia, and Latin America. Headquartered in Geneva, and with its 23+ global strategic offices, ITSS has been instrumental in helping legacy banks cement and sustain their position as leaders by evolving core banking systems to meet changing customer expectations.

Visit their website to find out more: https://www.itssglobal.com
